Entrepreneur: (and ((not (s "The Red Star"))    (xp_sum 100)   (stat_sum hp_or_mp 50)    (p ("Caravan Driver" "Hook-Up" Merchant Publican))))
G-Man: (and ((or ((s "Pure Blood")      (k "Lore - Strain - Pure Blood")))    (xp_sum 100)    (stat_sum hp_or_mp 50)    (k Literacy)    (k "Lore - Pre-Fall History Modern")    (k (Torture Interrogate))))
Gear Head: (and ((xp_sum 100)    (stat_sum hp_or_mp 50)    ((or (p (Caravan Driver "Hook-Up" Merchant Engineer "Mad Scientist"))      (s ("Diesel Jock" Rover))))    (k ("Building Tomorrow" Brewing "Forging the Future"))))
Merican Ba-Das: (and ((xp_sum 100)    (stat_sum hp 50)    (s Mericans)   (p Priest)    (p (Guard Officer "Gun Slinger" Hunter Primitive Pugilist Soldier Thug))))
Oni: (and ((xp_sum 100)    (stat_sum hp_or_mp 50)   (s "The Red Star")    (p (Guard Officer "Gun Slinger" Primitive Soldier))))
Overlord: (and ((xp_sum 100)   (stat_sum hp_or_mp 50)    (p (Assassin Doctor Gambler "Mad Scientist" "Ring Leader" Engineer))    (p (Charlatan Entertainer Politician Priest Teacher))))
Saint: (and ((xp_sum 100)   (or ((p (Cook Doctor Priest Teacher))      (s "Nation of Accensor")))    ((not (s "The Red Star")))))
Shepherd of the Land: (and ((xp_sum 200)    (stat_sum hp_or_mp 100)    (p (Cook Brewer Teacher Entertainer Farmer Fishmonger))))
